name: Thresher

pages.name: Thresher
pages.text: $(item)Right click$() the $(thing)Light Engineering Block$() in the middle layer opposite to Steel Sheetmetal with an Engineer's Hammer.

The $(thing)Thresher$() separates chaff from grain using rotating cylinders and mechanical power.$(br2)Items can be inputted from the top by a Hopper or a Dropping Conveyor Belt.$(br2)By default, it consumes 80IF/t.
